original_text: Furthermore, the Lord was angry with me because of you, and he swore that I should not cross the Jordan, and that I should not enter the good land that the Lord your God is giving you for an inheritance.
korean_text: 여호와께서 너희로 말미암아 내게 진노하사 내게 요단을 건너지 못하며 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 기업으로 주신 그 아름다운 땅에 들어가지 못하게 하리라고 맹세하셨은즉

sentences.original_text: the Lord was angry with me because of you,
that I should not cross the Jordan,
and that I should not enter the good land
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 그 좋은 땅에 들어가지 못할 것이라고

sentences.original_text: that the Lord your God is giving you
